title: Azhaipaayum Lyrics Irumbu Kuthirai Song lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Azhaipaayum
Music: G.V.Prakash Kumar
Singer(s): Vijay Prakash, Adrea Jeremiah
Lyrics: Thamarai
Movie: Irumbu Kudhirai

Azhaipaayum paarvai ondru..
Golusilla kaalgal rendu..
Urasadha thozhgal kondu..
Ennai kolludhea..

Mudhal naalil edho edho
Peasa Peasa thondrum..
Mudiyaamal thikki thikki 
vaarthai poi varum..

Mugamellam vervai
mottu etti etti paarkum..
Mudhal kadhal endraal
Idhu than nerum..
oh... oh....

Munpinnal unpol oru pennodu
ondragavea engeayum 
sendrenillai arivaaiya..

kann paarthu naan peasanum..
kai korthu ulavanum..
En thozhil nee saayanum..
azhagea......

Aniyum udayum..
Thadavum vaasam
Enmeal padum dhooram dhaan..

Unakkum manadhil
salanam varudha..??
Varanum endraalum
enna seiyanum..
oh.... oh.....

Kann melea kalabamo..
Enmelea ulaavumo..
En indha pen mogamo
enaku...

Nee nirkum therasulea..
naan vaithen nilavinai..
nee keelea nila adhu
melea..

puruvam irandum
valayum idathil..
puthayil irundhaalum
poi illai..
oh..... oh.... oh......

Azhaipaayum paarvai ondru..
Golusilla kaalgal rendu..
Urasadha thozhgal kondu..
Ennai kolludhea..

Mudhal naalil edho edho
Peasa Peasa thondrum..
Mudiyaamal thikki thikki 
vaarthai poi varum..

Mugamellam vervai
mottu etti etti paarkum..
Mudhal kadhal endraal
Idhu than nerum..
oh... oh....
